mapper.select: SELECT t.trade_id, t.kind, t.trade_start_time, t.trade_end_time, t.cost, t.region, t.detail, t.state, t.large_dog, t.super_id, t.user_id, JSON_ARRAYAGG(p.pet_name) AS petNames, u.nickname AS nickname FROM Trade t LEFT JOIN Together tg ON t.trade_id = tg.trade_id LEFT JOIN Pet p ON tg.pet_id = p.pet_id LEFT JOIN User u ON t.super_id = u.user_id WHERE t.kind = '해주세요' AND t.region LIKE '%서울%' GROUP BY t.trade_id, t.kind, t.trade_start_time, t.trade_end_time, t.cost, t.region, t.detail, t.state, t.large_dog, u.nickname ORDER BY t.trade_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Together tg LEFT JOIN Pet p ON tg.pet_id = p.pet_id WHERE tg.trade_id = #{tradeId}
SELECT * FROM Trade t LEFT JOIN Cand c ON c.trade_id = t.trade_id WHERE c.user_id = #{candId} AND kind = '해주세요';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Trade (kind, trade_start_time, trade_end_time, cost, region, detail, state, large_dog, super_id, user_id) VALUES (#{kind}, #{tradeStartTime}, #{tradeEndTime}, #{cost}, #{region}, #{detail}, #{state}, #{largeDog}, #{superId}, #{userId})
